TEXT: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can't open non-Boss chests.
The first #ySkill you play on turn #b1 is played twice.
Whenever you #yRest, you may add an #yUpgraded card into your deck.
Upon pickup, gain #b2 Potion slots and a random Potion.
Whenever you would deal #b4 or less unblocked attack damage, increase it to #b5. NL You do not receive damage from #yThorns or #ySharp #yHide.
